course_description: This course examines cultural and physical landscapes and their temporal and spatial changes of natural and built environments and by incorporating the use of geospatial technologies and methods in their examination.
prerequisites: ENVS 131 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - N302
sections: Class Nbr: 3732, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: M. Page, Status: Open
